title: 3 AM
episode_desc: Former Marine Frank Castle takes the law into his own hands while struggling to come to terms with his traumatic past.
show_desc: After the murder of his family, Marine veteran Frank Castle becomes the vigilante known as "The Punisher," with only one goal in mind: to avenge them.
